data.title: Marriages Announcements 2023
data.meta_description: Duke Eberhard of Württemberg (b.20 June 1963) [son of late Carl, Duke of Württemberg (1936-7 June 2022) & his wife. Princess Diane d'Orléans (b.1940)]...
data.text:
The marriage has recently taken place at Ely Cathedral between Tristram St John R. Coates [born 1994], younger son of Nicholas John Coates, of Northington House, Overton, and his wife the former Virginia Anne Julia Frances de Stacpoole [born 28 January, 1963], scion of that Irish landed gentry family who hold a Papal dukedom, & [Portia Ruth] Isobel Stanley [born 19 April, 1995], scion of the Earls of Derby, only daughter of the Hon Peter Hugh Charles Stanley, DL [born 4 March, 1964], of New England Stud, Newmarket, & his wife the former Hon Frances Caroline Burke Roche, DL [born 31 March, 1965], daughter of the late 5th Baron Fermoy [1939-1984].

In Aug 2021 Tristram's elder brother, Jolyon [b 21 May, 1992], announced his engagement to Isabel Rose [Wizz] Douglas-Hamilton [born 1991], a granddaughter paternally of the 14th Duke of Hamilton [1903-73].

The bride is a second cousin of the Prince of Wales and the Duke of Sussex. Her grandfather, the late Lord Fermoy, was a brother of the Hon Mrs Frances Shand Kydd [1936-2004], mother of Diana, Princess of Wales [1961-97].

Source: Peerage News

Coribinian, Prinz von Bayern, married Magdalena von Kessel (27) on the 12th of August on the biggest German Island Rügen.

https://www.bunte.de/royals/royals-...en-wir-ueber-corbinian-von-bayerns-braut.html

(With a video and pics, but in German only, sorry!)

While the House of Bayern/Bavaria is well known, the bride is from an old. noble German Family, which orginated in Thuringia:

https://de.wikipedia.org/wiki/Kessel_(thüringisches_Adelsgeschlecht)

Like all of the East-German Nobility they had a hard time after WW2, but the bride's branch of the family is coming back. On the Island Rügen they have built a little department store for regional products with a restaurant, a bakery and smoked fish outlet. Plus: There is pasta factory too, with 60 sorts of pasta.

Count Carl Johan af Rosenborg (*1952), son of Prince Flemming of Denmark (1922-2002), who became Count af Rosenborg upon his marriage, and his wife Ruth Nielsen (1924-2010), married Vanessa Barker this year.

This is his fourth marriage. From 1982 to 1986, he was married to Dorrit Olsen and had a daughter, Caroline (*1984). From 1994 to 2004 he was married to Colette Cabral and had another daughter, Josephine (*1999). His third marriage to Lisa Jeanne Stollar lasted from 2013 to 2016.

Source: Descendants of King Christian IX of Denmark

Anna Feldscher (*1998), daughter of Archduchess Hedwig of Austria (*1972) and her husband Georg Feldscher (*1968), got married this year to Count Paul Ceschi a Santa Croce (*1997), son of Count Philipp Ceschi a Santa Croce and his wife Stephanie von Loe.

Source: http://heinbruins.nl/FraKa.html

Archduke Alexander of Austria (b.26 September 1990) [son of Archduke Carl-Christian of Austria (b.1954) & his wife Marie-Astrid, nee Princess of Luxemburg (b.1954)] married Natacha Roumiantzeff-Pachkevitch (b.November or December 1987) [daughter of Nicholas Roumiantzeff-Pachkevitch & his wife Maria, nee Meeuwissen] in the Eglise Saint-Pierre in Beloeil (Belgium) on 30 September.

Alexander is fourth of five children, youngest son and last one who marries.

Source: their wedding thread.

Infanta Maria Francisca of Portugal, Duchess of Coimbra (b.3 March 1997) [daughter of Duarte Joгo, Duke of Braganza (b.1945) & his wife Isabel Ines de Castro Curvelho de Heredia (b.1966)] married Duarte Maria de Sousa Araújo Martins (b. 14 May 1992) [one of four sons of Pedro Martins and & his wife Maria do Carmo de Sousa Araújo] in the Palace of Mafra, Mafra (Portugal) on 7 October.

Maria Francisca is second of three children, only daughter and first one who marries.

She has two brothers: Infant Afonso of Portugal, Prince of Beira (b. 25 March 1996) and Infant Dinis of Portugal, Duke of Porto (b. 25 November 1999).

Source: their wedding thread.

Other couples who got married this year:

Louis-Nicolas Crépy (b.1995) [son of Clothilde d'Evreux, became Princess Clotilde of Orléans in 1999 (b.1968) {herself eldest of four children of Michel of Orléans, count of Évreux (b.1941) & his first wife Beatrice Pasquier de Franclieu (b.1941)} & her husband Edouard Crépy (b.1969)] married Carolina Torío Ballester (b.1997).

He is the eldest of his parents' five children and first one who marries, as well as his maternal grandparents' grandchild who marries.

His younger brother Charles-Édouard (b.1996) will marry Anna-Magdalena Goebel next year.

Other siblings are Gaspard-Marie (b.1999), Augustin (b.2005) & Éléonore (b.2007).

Source: http://heinbruins.nl/LouPhil.html

Count Maximilian Formentini (b.1993) [son of Count Filippo Formentini (b.1964) {himself son of late Baroness Alice Taxis von Bordogna und Valnigra, became Alice Tasso de Saxe-Coburgo e Braganзa in 1951 (1936-2013) & her husband Count Michele Formentini (b.1929)} & his wife Maria Vittoria, nee Mattiroli (b.1967)] married Marina Barbato.

Maximilian is the eldest of three sons and first one who marries; his brothers are Alexander (b.1997) & Sebastian (b.2006).

Source: as above.

Couples who married this year - c.d.

Prince Christian Ludwig of Prussia (b.1986) [son of Prince Christian-Sigismund of Prussia (b.1946) & his wife Countess Nina zu Reventlow (b.1954)] married Baroness Désirée von Künsberg (b.1988).

His only sister Irina (b.1988) is reportedly single.

He has also half-sister Isabelle-Alexandra von Preussen (b.1969) by the relationship of his father and Christiane Grandmontagne (b.1946).

Source: Descendants of German Emperor Wilhelm I

Caitriana Mary Alice Graham (b.11 April 1984) [scion of the Dukes of Montrose, eldest daughter of Lord Donald Alasdair Graham (b.1956) & his wife Bride Donalda Elpseth, nee Cameron (b.1956, scion of the Camerons of Lochiel) and granddaughter of the late 7th Duke of Montrose (1907-1992)] married Benjamin Paul S. Wonnacott (b.1985) [elder son of Timothy Wonnacott (b.1951, chartered auctioneer and antiques expert) & his wife Helen Mary, nee Mackay); the same year their son, Hector Alasdhair, was born.

Source: Descendants of Grand Duke Karl of Baden

Camilla Facchinetti Pulazzini (b.1992) [daughter of Countess María de la Trinidad von Collalto und San Salvatore (b.1964) & her husband Giovanni, Count Facchinetti Pulazzini (b.1956)] married Cavaliere Don Edoardo Orri.

Camilla is the eldest of three children, only daughter and first one who marries; her brothers are Filippo (b.1993) & Manfredo (b.1999).

Source: as above.

Baron Gaudenz von Kripp zu Prunberg und Krippach (b.1993) [son of Baron Sigmund Otto von Kripp zu Prunberg und Krippach (b.1962) {himself son of Countess Magdalena of Stolberg-Stolberg (b.1930) & her late husband Martin, Baron von Kripp zu Prunberg und Krippach (1924-1990)} & his wife Countess Ludmilla Kálnoky de Kőröspatak (b.1964)] married Antonia Bohrer-Biowitzky (b.1988).

Gaudenz is the eldest of four children, only son and first one who marries; his sisters are: Johanna (b.1995), Marie Valerie (b.1999) & Theresa (b.2001).

Source: http://heinbruins.nl/FraKa.html

Count Konstantin of Waldburg of Zeil and Trauchburg (b.7 August 1994) [son of Count Clemens of Waldburg of Zeil and Trauchburg (b.1960) & his wife Princess Georgine of Liechtenstein (b.1962)] married Countess Tiziana von Pachta von Reyhofen (b.26 November 1994) [daughter of Count Erasmus von Pachta von Reyhofen & his wife Marie Therese, nee Lippert]

Konstantin is fourth of five children, younger son and second one who marries; his eldest sister Maria- Annunciata (b.1988) married Cecil von Treu (b.1987) in 2017 and in 2020 they had a child.

Other siblings are: Maria Assunta (b.1990), Maximilian (b.1992) & Philippa (b.1996).

Source: as above.

Victoria Elisabeth Princess of Hohenlohe-Langenburg, Duchess of Medinaceli (b.17 March 1997) [elder of two children of late Marco, Prince of Hohenlohe-Langenburg, Duke of Medinaceli (1962-2016) & his former wife Sandra Schmidt-Polex (b.1968)] married Maxime Corneille in Jerez de la Frontera (Spain) on 14 October.

A bride-to-be has a brother Alexander Gonzalo (b.9 March 1999).

Sources: https://www.hola.com/novias/2023101...ohenlohe-vestido-novia-boda-jerez/?viewas=amp

https://www.hola.com/actualidad/202...hohenlohe-boda-duquesa-medinaceli/?viewas=amp (Thanks, Linda 26)

Update:

Louis-Nicolas Crépy (b.1995) [son of Clothilde d'Evreux, became Princess Clotilde of Orléans in 1999 (b.1968) {herself eldest of four children of Michel of Orléans, count of Évreux (b.1941) & his first wife Beatrice Pasquier de Franclieu (b.1941)} & her husband Edouard Crépy (b.1969)] married Carolina Torío Ballester (b.1997) in the Cathedral in Valencia on 14 October.

He is the eldest of his parents' five children and first one who marries, as well as his maternal grandparents' grandchild who marries.

His younger brother Charles-Édouard (b.1996) will marry Anna-Magdalena Goebel next year.

Other siblings are Gaspard-Marie (b.1999), Augustin (b.2005) & Éléonore (b.2007).

Sources: https://www.instagram.com/p/CyYuz1hu_BR/

Hélèna Bécaud (b.1998) [second of three daughters of Tania de Bourbon de Parme (b.1961) {herself eldest of three children of late Prince André of Bourbon-Parma (1928-2011) & his morganatic wife Marina, nee Gacry (b.1935)} & her former husband Gilbert "Gaya" Silly, who became Gaya Bécaud in 1971 (b.1953) {himself firstborn son of famous French singer Gilbert Bécaud (ne Francois Silly; 1927-2001) & his first wife, Monique Nicolas (1929-2002)}] married her longtime partner and father of her son Ezequiel (b.2021) Sergio Santana, this year; the same year also their second son, Salvador, was born.

Source: https://heinbruins.nl/Christian.html

Andrea Agnelli (b.1976) [son of late Umberto Agnelli (1934-2004) & his second wife Donna Allegra Caracciolo [dei principi di Castagneto] (b.1945)] married his longtime partner Deniz Akalin (b.1983) this year; they already have two daughters together: Livia Selin (b.2017) & Vera Nil (b.2018).

For Andrea Agnelli it's second marriage; he was previously (from 2005) married to Emma Winter (b. around 1977), which marriage reportedly ended in divorce; by her he has a daughter Baya (b.2005) and a son Giacomo Dai (b.2011).

Source: https://heinbruins.nl/Agnelli.html
